name: dedth3v
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4
body: -| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(c2, cif(c2, c3, w0)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w0)), wb(w3, w4))

stmt.origin: dedth3h(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0, w0, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
stmt.pretty: dedth3h(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0, w0, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(c2, cif(c2, c3, w0)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w0)), wb(w3, w4))
-| w4

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(c2, cif(c2, c3, w0)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wceq(c4, cif(c4, c5, w0)), wb(w3, w4))
-| w4

comment: Weak deduction theorem for eliminating a hypothesis with 3 class variables. See comments in ~ dedth2v . (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1999.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 28-Jul-2009.)
